name: Ship Game (Ethan Ho)
description:
Ship game is a fun and interactive 2-d puzzle game that involves the player controlling whirlpools that help guide a pirate ship to the safety of the docks. While trying to reach the docks players will have to avoid islands and the police!

Ship Game has a total of 6 levels and was made as part of a group project between members of the UCSB Game Development Club for a quarterly project. I was in charge of the concept and level design where I worked with others to create a conversation between all team members. I also wanted to create increasingly complex levels while also rewarding the players with challenging levels and puzzles.
